name: Reanimated Wrongdoing
description:
Made in 9 hours for the Clickteam "Weirder Things" Game Jam at Tyler, TX.

Made by:

Kyle Ruffin, Devon Youngbird, Veronica Liu, Christopher Walka

UTD "Whoosh!"

Controls: Up (Jump + double jumps), Left / Right (Move), Down (Summon Zombies), Space (Kick zombies + chests)

Support this project and we'll continue working on it!
